name: Kaiju Capture Mission
text: Once per turn, if there are less than 3 Kaiju Counters on this card: You can target 1 "Kaiju" monster on the field; change it to face-down Defense Position, then place 1 Kaiju Counter on this card (max. 3). If this card in your possession is destroyed by an opponent's card and sent to your Graveyard: You can draw 2 cards. You can only use this effect of "Kaiju Capture Mission" once per turn.
